body_content.explanation: used to refer to the supporters at a game between two teams of eleven players, when they give such good support to their team that they have as much value as an extra player might have:
examples: We need the fans to be right behind us as a twelfth man.
The 12th Man has been making a difference with the Seattle Seahawks for decades.

body_content.explanation: in a cricket team, an extra player in addition to the eleven members of the team, who plays if one of the team is injured and who has some special duties during the game:
examples: He was three times England's twelfth man in Test matches at home and abroad last year.
